name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 1, in the women's 100-meter hurdles final of the Hangzhou Asian Games, Chinese athletes Lin Yuwei and Wu Yanni hugged and encouraged each other.
However, because the numbers of the two people in the photo formed "June 4th", the photo was blocked in the firewall.
Currently, only a few photos from a few media outlets have not been banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens compare oil prices in China and Taiwan

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 29, Northwest Normal University said that due to staff errors, the number of students who were guaranteed admission to graduate school exceeded the planned quota, and some students will not be able to be admitted to graduate school.
The school said that the result cannot be changed, but it will try to help students.
Some students whose qualifications for graduate school were cancelled said that because it is too late to prepare for the postgraduate entrance examination, it is equivalent to being delayed by the school for a year for no reason.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Please don't give me a blowjob"
On October 2, at the Zhenjiang Paopao Island Music Festival, Chen Li's lyrics were replaced with "blowjob" instead of "kill" and "cheap", making the originally normal lyrics erotic, sparking heated discussions among netizens

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 2, in response to the recent upsurge of Chinese tourists to Japan, the Chinese media suddenly went all out, denying that a large number of Chinese tourists were traveling to Japan, accusing the Japanese media of hyping up the "Chinese tourists to Japan" and saying that "almost no one signed up for tour groups to Japan"

name: 李老师不是你老师

"The most beautiful retrograde"
On October 1, at the closing meeting of the International Atomic Energy Agency General Conference, one country, including China, strongly criticized the discharge of nuclear waste water from Fukushima.
A minority of 132 countries disagreed with China's position.

By the way, the predictions of a certain Zhihu netizen are all correct at present

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 2, a Meituan delivery boy in Wuhu posted a video to call out Meituan CEO Wang Xing: Why do other industries have triple wages during the Mid-Autumn Festival and National Day, but delivery boys don’t get any subsidies?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Chat records circulated online show that
A netizen who attended the Nanyang Midi Music Festival caught villagers who came to move things, but was protected by the police.
I posted the video on TikTok, and the Internet police called and asked me to delete it

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
See "Nanyang Folding" from Nanyang Midi Music Festival.
On the one hand, in order to attract tourism, the local government mobilized the whole city to invest manpower and material resources to hold a music festival that is common in developed areas, and made an exception to allow the audience to bring flags and play human waves, restore the past music festival tradition, and try to keep the music festival in Nanyang.
However, this music festival has also become a rare opportunity for poor locals to "squeeze resources". There are frequent incidents of overcharging, stealing, and beating tourists.
Is it that the cognition of the people of Nanyang cannot keep up with the Nanyang Municipal Government?
Or is it that the Nanyang Municipal Government is too presumptuous and thinks that a music festival can turn Nanyang into Zibo, without really thinking about solving the difficulties faced by the people?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that recently, high school students in Xi'an launched a campaign to demand holidays. Some students posted big-character posters on campus, and high school students across the city also formed a QQ group to contact each other and collectively report that schools did not follow the statutory holidays required by the state. It is said that 61 schools have delayed the start of school due to student protests.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: This indirectly reflects why the people of Nanyang "cannot keep up with the Nanyang Municipal Government":

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In recent months, this scam has become very common among Chinese students studying abroad. Victims usually receive calls disguised as 10086, providing a number that claims to be a Chinese police officer for the victim to contact, saying that the victim is suspected of "money laundering" or "fraud", and will wear police uniforms and video-record the victim, and then ask the victim for a deposit, otherwise they will be deported. 
Victims often find out that they have been deceived only after paying a huge deposit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, it is rumored that the Xi'an Education Commission has begun to leak the phone numbers of students who make reporting calls to the reported schools for internal investigation.
